name: Blaster free
description:
Amazing graphics with scrolling background, explosive sound effects and great quality menu and game play music. One touch moving and firing function. Auto save and load feature. Difficulty level increases with your score. Try to beat your high score in this non stop action and challenging shooting game.

Product features

- No Ads
- Auto save and load feature
- One touch moving and firing function
- Brilliant graphics, music and sounds effects
